0.title: GatherBoard Mobile
0.text: Gatherboard is an event sharing platform. This app was developed using the ionic framework to complement the website and make access easier for those on the go.

1.title: Recipe Book
1.text: Recipe book is a program developed in java as a way to keep track of your recipes. It allows you to create recipes with portions and instructions so you can know how to make them just like you want!

2.title: Bustin' Out
2.text: Bustin' Out was a partially developed game 2D platformer using C#. The premise is that Megaman was a renegade cop who got arrested for going off the wall and now finds himself in prison where he must figure out how to make it the roof to make his great escape.
